select b_a.*, b_b.f_book_name, b_b.f_book_isbn, b_b.f_book_price, b_b.f_book_publish, b_b.f_book_type, b_b.f_book_edtion, b_b.f_book_editor, b_b.f_book_number, b_b.f_book_iswrite, COUNT(b_s.f_id) as number from b_apply_book b_a LEFT JOIN b_book_list b_b on b_a.f_book_id=b_b.f_id LEFT JOIN b_student_book b_s on b_a.f_book_id=b_s.f_book_id and b_s.f_delete_flag=0 WHERE b_a.f_delete_flag=0
AND b_a.f_user_id=${currentUser}
AND b_b.f_book_name like concat("%", #{keyword},"%")
GROUP BY b_a.f_id

select b_a.*, b_b.f_book_name, b_b.f_book_isbn, b_b.f_book_price, b_b.f_book_publish, b_b.f_book_type, b_b.f_book_edtion, b_b.f_book_editor, b_b.f_book_number, b_b.f_book_iswrite, t_u.`level`, t_u.`real_name` from b_apply_book b_a LEFT JOIN b_book_list b_b on b_a.f_book_id=b_b.f_id LEFT JOIN t_user t_u ON b_a.f_user_id=t_u.f_id WHERE b_a.f_delete_flag=0
AND b_a.f_state=${waitReviewState}
AND b_a.f_state!=1
GROUP BY b_a.f_id

SELECT b_a.f_course_name, b_a.f_book_id, b_a.f_apply_year, b_s.f_id AS choose_id, b_a.f_state, b_a.f_course_attribute, b_b.* FROM b_apply_book b_a LEFT JOIN b_book_list b_b on b_a.f_book_id=b_b.f_id
LEFT JOIN b_student_book b_s on ${current_user}= b_s.f_user_id and b_a.f_book_id=b_s.f_book_id and b_s.f_delete_flag=0
WHERE b_a.f_delete_flag=0 and (b_a.f_state=2 or b_a.f_state>2)
and FIND_IN_SET(#{class},b_a.f_class)

SELECT b_a.f_course_name, b_a.f_book_id, b_a.f_id, b_a.f_apply_year, b_a.f_state, b_s.f_id AS choose_id, b_b.f_book_name, b_b.f_book_editor, b_b.f_book_edtion -- COUNT(b_s.f_id) as number FROM b_apply_book b_a LEFT JOIN b_book_list b_b on b_a.f_book_id=b_b.f_id LEFT JOIN b_student_book b_s on b_a.f_book_id=b_s.f_book_id and b_s.f_delete_flag=0 WHERE b_a.f_delete_flag=0 and (b_a.f_state=9 or b_a.f_state=7)
and FIND_IN_SET(#{class},b_a.f_class)

SELECT b_b.*, b_a.f_course_name, b_a.f_apply_year, b_a.f_book_id, b_e.f_grade, b_e.f_list, b_e.f_remark, b_e.f_id as eva_id, b_e.f_user_id FROM b_book_list b_b LEFT JOIN b_student_book b_s ON b_b.f_id=b_s.f_book_id and b_s.f_user_id=${current_user} LEFT JOIN b_apply_book b_a ON b_a.f_book_id=b_b.f_id and FIND_IN_SET(#{class},b_a.f_class) and b_a.f_book_id=b_s.f_book_id LEFT JOIN b_evaluate b_e ON b_s.f_book_id=b_e.f_book_id and b_e.f_user_id=${current_user} -- join t_user t_u -- on b_e.f_user_id=${current_user} where b_s.f_delete_flag=0

SELECT b_e.f_book_id, AVG(b_e.f_grade) as f_grade, b_b.f_book_name FROM `b_evaluate` b_e LEFT JOIN b_student_book b_s ON b_s.f_book_id=b_e.f_book_id LEFT JOIN b_book_list b_b ON b_b.f_id=b_e.f_book_id GROUP BY b_e.f_book_id
